Class StudentHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.StudentHomePage
public class StudentHomePage extends Object
This page handles the student interface for viewing and managing questions and answers. Students can ask questions, provide answers, and track their interactions.

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, User user)
      Displays the student page in the provided primary stage.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage where the scene will be displayed.
      user - The user object containing student information.

    • showAskQuestionDialog

      private void showAskQuestionDialog(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Question> questionTable)
      Displays a dialog allowing the student to ask a new question.
      Parameters:
      questionTable - The question table to refresh after adding a new question

    • showAnswersDialog

      private void showAnswersDialog(Question question, User user, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Question> questionTable)
      Displays a dialog showing answers for a specific question.
      Parameters:
      question - The question whose answers are being displayed.
      user - The current user viewing the answers.
      questionTable - The main question table to refresh after updates.

    • createReviewTable

      private javafx.scene.control.TableView<String[]> createReviewTable(List<String[]> reviewList, String reviewType)
      Creates a table view for displaying reviews.
      Parameters:
      reviewList - The list of reviews to display
      reviewType - The type of reviews (question or answer)
      Returns:
      A configured TableView for the reviews

    • applySearchFilter

      private void applySearchFilter(String keyword, String filterType, String filterValue, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Question> questionTable)
      Applies the search filter to the question table.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The search keyword
      filterType - The filter type (All, Answered, Unanswered, Reviewer)
      filterValue - The filter value (for Reviewer filter)
      questionTable - The table to update with filtered results
